summary.span: 建立在頁面上顯示影像的控制項。

span.span: Creates a control that displays an image on a page.

summary.span: 按一下在 控制項中所定義的作用點 (Hot Spot) 區域時，控制項會產生回傳到伺服器或巡覽至指定的 URL。

span.span: When a hot spot region defined within the control is clicked, the control either generates a postback to the server or navigates to a specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用建立映像，其中包含的控制項定義作用點區域。Use the control to create an image that contains defined hot spot regions. 當使用者按一下的作用點區域時，控制項可以產生回傳至伺服器，或瀏覽至指定的 URL。When a user clicks a hot spot region, the control can either generate a postback to the server or navigate to a specified URL. 例如，您可以使用這個控制項來顯示地理區域的地圖。For example, you can use this control to display a map of a geographical region. 當使用者按一下特定的區域在地圖上時，控制項巡覽至 URL，提供有關所選區域的其他資料。When a user clicks a specific region on the map, the control navigates to a URL that provides additional data about the selected region. 您也可以使用這個控制項產生回傳至伺服器並執行特定程式碼，根據按下的作用點區域。You can also use this control to generate a postback to the server and run specific code based on the hot spot region that was clicked. 例如，您可以使用擷取使用者回應，例如投票的控制項。For example, you can use an control to capture user responses such as votes. 當使用者按一下定義為 yes 票數的作用點區域時，就會在資料庫中記錄是回應呼叫程式碼。When a user clicks the hot spot region defined for yes votes, code is called to record a yes response in a database. 當使用者按一下定義為任何投票的作用點區域時，會不記錄任何回應。When a user clicks on the hot spot region defined for no votes, a no response is recorded. 您也可以混合這兩種情況，在單一控制項。You can also mix these two scenarios within a single control. 例如，您可以指定一個作用點區域瀏覽至 URL 並張貼至伺服器的另一個作用點區域。For example, you can specify one hot spot region to navigate to a URL and another hot spot region to post back to the server. 使用屬性來指定要顯示之影像的路徑控制項。Use the property to specify the path to the image to display for the control. 您可以定義任意數目的物件內控制項。You can define any number of objects within an control. 您可以使用， ，和類別來定義作用點區域。You can use the , , and classes to define hot spot regions. 或者，您可以衍生自抽象類別來定義您自己自訂的作用點物件。Alternatively, you can derive from the abstract class to define your own custom hot spot object. 有兩種方式，以指定行為中的物件控制何時按下。There are two ways to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 您可以使用上的屬性控制或屬性，針對個別物件。You can use either the property on the control or the property on an individual object. 這些屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。These properties are set using one of the enumeration values. 如果設定這兩個屬性，指定每個個別屬性物件會優先於上的屬性控制項。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 若要巡覽至 URL，設定屬性或屬性設`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。To navigate to a URL, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用屬性來指定所要巡覽的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要產生回傳至伺服器，設定屬性或屬性設`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To generate a postback to the server, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 使用屬性，以指定的作用點區域的名稱。Use the property to specify a name for the hot spot region. 此名稱將會傳入時就會發生回傳事件的事件資料。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 當回傳按下時，就會引發事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 以程式設計方式控制執行的動作時回傳是按下，提供的事件處理常式事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要讓所有中的物件控制項擁有相同的行為，使用屬性來指定行為。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property to specify the behavior. 然後，設定每個個別的屬性物件`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未指定值屬性。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行為，如中的物件，將屬性，每個個別物件給`HotSpotMode.Navigate`或`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an , set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate` or `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項的屬性或上的任何屬性它包含的物件設定為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`，或未設定為值，預設行為是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or is not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，因而導致的頁面，即可瀏覽至指定的 URL 每次使用者按一下其中一個圓形作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, which causes the page to navigate to the specified URL each time a user clicks one of the circle hot spot regions. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/CS/imagemapclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/VB/imagemapclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，會使頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含具有不同行為的作用點。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains hot spots with different behaviors. 背景區域會定義為單一文章回傳至伺服器。The background area is a defined as a single that posts back to the server. 三個物件定義於相同的區域。Three objects are defined in the same region. 每個這些作用點看起來像按鈕，並巡覽至 URL。Each of these hot spots looks like a button and navigates to a URL. 當兩個的作用點重疊，宣告作用點第一次具有優先順序的區域中按下控制項時。When an control is clicked in a region where two hot spots overlap, the hot spot that is declared first has precedence. 在此範例中，先宣告按鈕的作用點，並包含這些背景作用點，則最後宣告。In this example, the button hot spots are declared first and the background hot spot that contains them is declared last. 因此，使用者會取得按鈕的行為物件，而不是背景物件，當使用者按一下按鈕的作用點。Therefore, the user gets the behavior of the button object, not the background object, when the user clicks a button hot spot. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/CS/imagemapclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/VB/imagemapclass3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生在按一下 控制項上的 物件時。

span.span: Occurs when a object in an control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時物件中按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允許引發事件，您必須先將上的屬性控制項或屬性物件`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 以程式設計方式控制執行的動作時回傳是按下，提供的事件處理常式事件，其中包含要引發事件時執行的程式碼。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event that contains the code to run when the event is raised. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，會使頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. `VoteMap_Clicked`事件處理常式處理 click 事件控制項。The `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler handles the click event for the control. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下 物件時， 控制項之 物件的預設行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the default behavior for the objects of an control when the objects are clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定預設的按一下行為內的物件控制項。Use the property to specify the default click behavior of the objects within an control. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|物件沒有任何行為。The object does not have any behavior.| |`NotSet`|物件會使用所設定的行為控制項的屬性。The object uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控制項不會定義行為，物件所有瀏覽至 URL。If the control does not define the behavior, the objects all navigate to a URL.| |`Navigate`|物件巡覽至的 URL。The objects navigate to a URL.| |`PostBack`|物件產生回傳至伺服器。The objects generate a postback to the server.| 您可以指定使用物件的行為屬性控制項或屬性的每個個別物件。You can specify a object's behavior using either the property of the control or the property of each individual object. 如果設定這兩個屬性，指定每個個別屬性物件會優先於上的屬性控制項。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 當您設定的屬性控制項，請注意，`HotSpotMode.NotSet`和`HotSpotMode.Navigate`值有相同的行為： 同時瀏覽至 URL。When you set the property of the control, note that the `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and `HotSpotMode.Navigate` values have the same behavior: both navigate to a URL. 當您指定`HotSpotMode.NotSet`針對個別物件，這個物件決定其行為的值從屬性控制項。When you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, that determines its behavior from the value of the property of the control. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Navigate`for 屬性中，巡覽至 URL 的頁面時按下。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property, the page navigates to a URL when the is clicked. 使用屬性來指定所要巡覽的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.PostBack`for屬性，頁面會產生回傳至伺服器時按下。If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property, the page generates a postback to the server when the is clicked. 使用屬性，以指定的作用點區域的名稱。Use the property to specify the name of the hot spot region. 此名稱將會傳入時就會發生回傳事件的事件資料。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 當回傳按下時，就會引發事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 以程式設計方式控制執行的動作時回傳是按下，提供的事件處理常式事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Inactive`for屬性，物件沒有任何行為在按一下時。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 您可以使用此值來建立較大的作用中的作用點內非作用中的作用點。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 此選項可讓您建立更複雜的作用點區域內控制項。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an control. 若要建立的非作用中的區域內作用中的作用點，您必須指定非使用中的作用點，在使用中的作用點之前控制項。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如，下列藉由指定非使用中的圓形作用點較大 active 圓形作用點內定義一個使用中的環形：For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ``` 若要好讓所有中的物件控制項擁有相同的行為，並使用上的屬性控制項來指定行為。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property on the control to specify the behavior. 然後，設定每個個別的屬性物件`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未指定值屬性。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行為，如中的物件控制項，並設定屬性，每個個別物件給`HotSpotMode.Navigate`， `HotSpotMode.PostBack`，或`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項的屬性或上的任何屬性它包含的物件會設定為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`，或未設定為值，預設行為是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is either set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，會使頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 屬性未設定在每一份物件，因為他們取得它們的行為，從屬性。The property is not set on each of the objects because they get their behavior from the property. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/CS/imagemap.hotspotmode1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/VB/imagemap.hotspotmode1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的型別不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 在 控制項取得定義作用點區域的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

value.span: 在 控制項表示定義作用點的 物件。

span.span: A object that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以程式設計方式管理中的作用點區域控制項。Use the property to programmatically manage the hot spot regions in an control. 您可以使用屬性來新增、 插入、 移除及擷取物件。You can use the property to add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立控制項，並新增兩個給它的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create an control and add two objects to it. 屬性用來存取for控制項，然後將給它的物件。The property is used to access the for the control and add the objects to it. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/CS/imagemap.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/VB/imagemap.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that represents the control to restore.

summary.span: 從先前由 方法所儲存的網頁要求為 控制項還原檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

span.span: is not a valid .

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料之類型 的引數。

span.span: An argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時物件中按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允許引發事件，您必須先將上的屬性控制項或屬性物件`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 表單回傳至伺服器時，會引發 控制項的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when a form is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`參數來方法控制項。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method of the control. 引發事件已按下的物件。The raises a event for the object that was clicked.

span.para: 若要處理 click 事件，在衍生類別中的，覆寫方法。
To handle a click event in a derived class, override the method.

span.span: Sends the control content to the specified object, which writes the content to render on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 當開發的自訂伺服器控制項衍生自控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法，以產生內容。When developing a custom server control derived from the control, you can override this method to generate content for the .

summary.span: 儲存對 控制項的檢視狀態所做的任何變更，這些變更是網頁被回傳到伺服器時所發生。

span.span: Saves any changes to an control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 傳回 控制項的目前檢視狀態。

span.span: Returns the control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放在伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會傳回給用戶端會儲存在變數為`Hidden`HTML 項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率`ViewState`屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法以引發事件，以供控制當表單張貼至伺服器時。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

span.para: 若要定義的自訂實作，以引發的事件物件，覆寫成員。明確介面實作會呼叫方法以引發事件時張貼的資料已變更的控制項。

To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member. The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，其在按一下 控制項時會顯示連結 Web 網頁內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame that displays the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 目標視窗或框架，其在按一下 控制項時，會顯示指定的 Web 網頁。

span.span: The target window or frame that displays the specified Web page when the control is clicked.

value.span:
值必須以字母開頭中範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其開頭為底線：
呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。
呈現直接框架組父項中的內容。
轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。
呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。
呈現完整的視窗，在無框架的內容。
請檢查您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷支援值。例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更新版本都支援目標值。 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span:
Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore:
Renders the content in a new window without frames.
Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
Renders the content in the search pane.
Renders the content in the frame with focus.
Renders the content in the full window without frames.
Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported. For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value. The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗，顯示 r 中的 [Web] 頁面時按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page r when the control is clicked. 設定來指定網頁屬性。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 屬性使用時的值屬性是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`; 則會忽略它時的值屬性是`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。The property is used when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; it is ignored when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 如果屬性未設定、 瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗重新整理時按一下控制項時。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性上`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出，如必須是 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended that you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)並[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

summary.span: 追蹤 控制項的檢視狀態變更，以便可將其儲存在該控制項的 物件中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so they can be stored in the control's object.

summary.span: 這個物件可透過 屬性存取。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 ASP.NET 自動呼叫這個方法時初始化控制項時。This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the control is initialized.
